org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor

Interface InterceptorErrorHandler


  • public interface InterceptorErrorHandler
    Interceptor error handler to be implemented, by error handling for any of the interceptor types, including AbstractMessageInterceptor, AbstractServerInterceptor.

    The implemented error handler is associated to the interceptor implementations with the ErrorHandler annotation, while this can be just the class in which case there has to be a default constructor, it can also be loaded as a spring bean, by specifying the bean property of the annotation.

    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handleError(Event event, java.lang.Exception e)
      Implements the error handling for the type of the event to which this error handler belongs to.
